item.title: Once again I'm complaining about disturbing noise caused by traffic driving over the drain inspection cover outside our house, 7 The Grange Reddings . This problem has been ongoing now on and off for around 15 years despite a number of unsuccessful attempts at curing the problem (the last attempt was February this year). This problem needs a permanent solution like the use of products available from https://www.noisestop.it/en/, there are probably other companies making similar products. Perhaps another solution would be to weld the two halves of the cover together & to the frame as in all the time since the manhole was installed I've never once seen it removed for maintenance., 9th May
item.description:
Noisy manhole/drain inspection cover outside 7 The Grange Reddings

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, The Reddings, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes and failed repairs, 9th May
item.description:
The worst is where I’ve highlighted, just before the turn to the Star College. The road from the new roundabout to the Star College is dangerous to cycle, the road is in very poor repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Multiple pot holes, 9th May
item.description:
Multiple pot holes, VERY Rough Problem has been there since the work to the road was done ages ago. Drove over it today and now my car steers to the left. Needs ripping up and re-doing. This has only gotten worse. In between A40 and M5 turn off Gloucester bound carriage
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Highway tree roots in private property. Tree branches continually breaking damaging cars., 9th May
item.description:
Tree between 19 and 21 the Grove, off Hales Road, Cheltenham. Roots visible in garden of 19 the Grove potentially causing foundation issues. Also tree branches continuously braking and falling on to parked cars causing dents etc..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, The Grove, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
